author: Chloe Chaplain
title: London attack: Facebook activates safety check after Parliament terror attack
text:
Wednesday 22 March 2017 18:50 GMT Click to followThe Evening Standard Attack: Facebook started its feature for people to let friends and relatives know they are safe following the atrocity Carl Court/Getty Images 
Facebook has activated its safety check feature in London following the terror attack in Westminster. 
The feature allows people to mark they are “safe” in a status which is then published for their friends and family to see. 
The launch of “The Attack in Westminster safety check” – marks the first time the social media site has activated such a device in London. 
It has been used in the past during major incidents such as terror attacks in Paris, Berlin and Pakistan. Attack at Parliament, March 22, 2017 Attack at Parliament, March 22, 2017 1/30
